promoCards.title: Necrophobia
powers: {Nyctophobia} deals 1 target 1 infernal damage. If a target is destroyed this way, select a hero deck and reveal cards from that deck until a target or ongoing card is revealed. Put the revealed card into play and shuffle the remaining cards back into the deck.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
One hero deals one target 1 infernal damage.

openingLines.default: So much death... I will turn it against you!
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.TheSmilerCharacter: Your victims' spirits cry out for your blood! I will oblige them!

cards.title: Nyctophobia
powers: Increase the next damage dealt by {Nyctophobia} by 1.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may play a card.
One hero may use a power
Destroy a target with 2 or less HP.

openingLines.default: I am always behind you, like your shadow. Watching. Waiting.
openingLines.GuardiansOfTomorrow.TheSmilerCharacter: You're a monster of the worst kind! I will [b]END[/b] you!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: Yet you'll never see me coming.

cards.title: Backstab
body: {Nyctophobia} deals 1 target 1 irreducible melee damage. If a target dealt damage this way has no more HP remaining than the damage dealt, destroy it.

cards.title: Deadly Momentum
body: Increase the next damage dealt by {Nyctophobia} by the number of cards you played this turn. You may use a power.

cards.title: Hide in Plain Sight
body: Discard up to 3 cards. For each card discarded this way, reduce damage dealt to {Nyctophobia} until the start of your turn by 1 and increase the next damage dealt by {Nyctophobia} by 1.
cards.flavorText: Would you like fries with that?

cards.title: Memento Mori
body: Increase damage dealt by {Nyctophobia} to non-hero targets with 5 or less HP by 1. Whenever {Nyctophobia} destroys a target, {Nyctophobia} may deal 1 target 1 psychic damage.
cards.flavorText: Even such an ancient vampire is mortal.

cards.title: Opportune Strike
body: {Nyctophobia} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. Draw X cards where X is half the amount of damage dealt this way, rounded up.

cards.title: Out of Sight, Out of Mind
body: At the end of your turn, if {Nyctophobia} has not dealt damage this turn, reduce damage dealt to {Nyctophobia} by 1 until the start of your next turn and increase the next damage dealt by {Nyctophobia} by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: So when are we going to meet{br}this girlfriend of yours?

cards.title: Quick Stab
body: {Nyctophobia} deals 1 target 1 melee damage. If a target is destroyed this way, you may draw a card and play a card.

cards.title: Sap
body: Shuffle a non-character target with 3 or less HP into its owner's deck. You may draw a card or play a card.
cards.flavorText: It's not worth the mess to kill this one.

cards.title: Shadow Step
powers: Prevent the next damage dealt to {Nyctophobia}. Draw a card.
cards.flavorText: Anywhere there's a shadow, there I am.

cards.title: Sharpen
body: Draw a card. Increase the next damage dealt by {Nyctophobia} by 2.
cards.flavorText: Your blades can't possibly dull that fast.

cards.title: Stakeout
body: When a non-hero target enters play, you may draw a card and increase damage dealt by {Nyctophobia} to that target by 2 until the end of your next turn. If you do, destroy this card.

cards.title: Stalk Prey
body: Select a target. Increase damage dealt to that target by {Nyctophobia} by 1 until the start of your turn. You may play a card.
cards.flavorText: Show me the way, little demon...

cards.title: The Sword of Ehud
body: Increase melee damage dealt by {Nyctophobia} by 1.
powers: {Nyctophobia} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. If a target is destroyed this way, you may draw a card or play a card.
cards.flavorText: It's killed kings, tyrants, and monsters.{br}It will kill you too.
